<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description>sets the display values in alm_asset_ci_field_mapping, alm_asset_ci_state_mapping and alm_hardware_state_mapping </description> <name>Fix display values in asset ci map table</name> <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[function fixDisplayValueEntries() { var script = 'global.AssetFixScriptUtil.fixDisplayValuesForAssetCIMapTables();'; var name = 'Set display values in Asset-CI mapping tables'; new global.AssetManagementBaseJob().runScriptByJob(script, '', name, '', '', false); }
fixDisplayValueEntries();]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2023-07-12 10:23:00</sys_created_on> <sys_id>4add2a6c1c803510fa9bd7998173051f</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>8</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Fix display values in asset ci map table</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Asset Management" source="com.snc.asset_management">3e467ca03cb1311068bcf327dfe37f49</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_4add2a6c1c803510fa9bd7998173051f</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2023-08-03 03:37:02</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: Fix display values in asset ci map table
